Create diagnostic plots for filtered pool

Source: R/warm_filtering_plots.R
plot_filter_diagnostics.Rd

Internal function used by filter_warm_pool() to create diagnostic plots. Shows time series, statistics scatter, and wavelet GWS comparisons.

Usage

plot_filter_diagnostics(
  obs_series,
  sim_series,
  pool,
  rel_diff_mean,
  rel_diff_sd,
  tail_metrics,
  power_period,
  power_obs,
  power_signif,
  gws_cache,
  wavelet_q = c(0.05, 0.95)
)

Arguments

obs_series

Numeric vector of observed values

sim_series

Numeric matrix of simulated values

pool

Integer vector of pool indices

rel_diff_mean

Relative differences in mean

rel_diff_sd

Relative differences in SD

tail_metrics

Tail metrics list

power_period

Wavelet periods

power_obs

Observed GWS

power_signif

Significance curve

gws_cache

Cached GWS matrix (n_periods x n_realizations)

wavelet_q

Two quantiles for ribbon (e.g., c(0.50, 0.95))

Value

List of ggplot objects (timeseries, stats, wavelet_gws)
